page.title: 20SHOPPING
page.content: Yateley contains three main shopping parades as well as one in Frogmore (and one in Sandhurst covered by this grid. Apart from several smaller shops selling food there are two super markets and two self service shops. Other shops provide a wide range of goods for sale (Chemist,Newsagent,Jewellers,Off-licen ce,D.I.Y.,Clothes,Toy shops) .Yateley is well supplied with services.There are hair dressers,launderettes,estate agents,Betting shops,Travel agents,Post offices,video shops,Banks and,Building societies.There is no flower shop in Yateley (There is a nursery and florist in Sandhurst. The area has three Take-away shops and several restaurants and many public houses. There are several petrol stations with repair facilities.
